definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: edict, decree (Pers. loan-wd., OPers. patigâma (patigam, come to, arrive), NPers. paigaâm, message; v. Gildem ZKM iv. 214 Mey Entstehung 23; Aram. [[פִּתְגׇּמָא]], petgomo0 word, command, B Aram. = BH) ;—cstr. [[הַטֶּלֶךְ]] ´[[פ]] Es 1:20; c. genit. obj. [[מַעֲשֵׂה הָרָעָה]] Ec 8:11 (appar. f., cf. De; but Hi Albr:ZAW xvi (1896), 115 read [[נַעֲשֶׂה]] for [[נַעֲשָׂה]]).
